titles.title: To amend the Clean Air Act to allow emission reductions caused by fleet turnover to be credited to the emission reduction requirements of the Act.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary: 10/6/1994--Introduced. Amends the Clean Air Act to allow emission reductions attributable to fleet turnover to be creditable against required reductions in Moderate ozone nonattainment areas.
